Hero.description: I'm a Full Stack Developer specialized in crafting exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on building accessible, human-centered products.

Experience.seniorDesc: Working at the intersection of technology and communication for the state Digital Health program. Responsible for translating complex technical concepts into accessible formats for the general public and supporting the diffusion strategy of the program's digital tools.
Experience.desc1: Acting in the support and maintenance of legacy systems. Responsible for technical incident analysis, troubleshooting, and validation of fixes with the development team. Ensuring application stability and level 2 support for critical users.
Experience.desc2: Focused on requirements analysis and technical feasibility for large-scale projects (Multi-million budget). Responsible for validating complex business rules (Compliance), managing critical data, and optimizing workflows between government stakeholders and execution teams.

Projects.project1Desc: Performance-focused task manager. Implements full CRUD, local persistence (LocalStorage), and optimized state management for an instant experience.
Projects.project2Desc: Custom link aggregator with responsive interface and real-time theme switching system (Light/Dark mode). Focused on HTML semantics, performance, and user experience through micro-interactions.
Projects.project3Desc: This project is an institutional landing page for a custom furniture company, focused on a clean and elegant user experience. It was developed during my learning path with Rocketseat, applying fundamental concepts of web structuring and fidelity to original design.
Projects.project4Desc: Treine Me is a modern landing page developed for a physical training program. The goal is to offer exclusive workouts to help users achieve better performance and quality of life. The project features a clean and attractive interface, highlighting the main value proposition and a call to action (CTA).
